Title: Creates the incentivizing habitability opportunity program
Summary: Creates the incentivizing habitability opportunity program; provides that each local social services district shall provide an incentive to owners who enter into a residential lease or rental agreement with an eligible household for a qualified dwelling unit in order to address homelessness and ensure appropriate habitability standards.
LawCode: Add Art 2-A Title 5 ยง53, amd ยง153, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the incentivizing habitability opportunity program
